tasks.title: Create healthcare professional tools and patient management
tasks.description: Implement risk assessment workflow, patient case management, treatment protocol recommendations, resource allocation planning, and surveillance integration

tasks.title: Implement interactive risk maps with malaria prediction overlays
tasks.description: Build comprehensive mapping system with flutter_map integration, choropleth risk overlays, geographic controls, location services, real-time visualization, and map-based data filtering. Include risk level overlays, multiple map layers, offline caching, and custom markers for health facilities.

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive alert and notification system with Firebase and real-time updates
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive alert system including Firebase Cloud Messaging integration, alert management interface, push notifications, WebSocket real-time alerts, alert history tracking, emergency protocols, and customizable thresholds for malaria prediction alerts

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive real-time alert system with push notifications for malaria prediction warnings
tasks.description: Create complete alerts feature module with Flutter notification system, WebSocket integration, push notifications, alert management interface, and real-time alert streaming following Clean Architecture with BLoC pattern

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive analytics dashboard with Flutter data visualization
tasks.description: Create complete analytics feature module with fl_chart for data visualization, prediction accuracy metrics, environmental trend analysis, and custom report generation. Integrate with existing analytics datasources and models while following Flutter Clean Architecture with BLoC pattern.

tasks.title: Implement Dashboard and Navigation System for Flutter Malaria Prediction App
tasks.description: Create comprehensive dashboard feature module with Material Design 3 theme, responsive navigation system, and adaptive layouts for mobile/web/desktop platforms

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive fl_chart data visualization components for malaria prediction analytics dashboard
tasks.description: Create base chart widgets using fl_chart library including line charts for time series data, scatter plot charts for correlation analysis, bar charts for categorical data, pie charts for data distribution, chart configuration and customization options. Ensure proper integration with existing analytics entities.

tasks.title: Setup custom report generation system for analytics dashboard
tasks.description: Create comprehensive report generation system with PDF export, CSV export, customizable templates, chart embedding, scheduling, and sharing features. Integrate with existing analytics BLoC and entities.

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive geographic controls and user interactions for risk maps
tasks.description: Create interactive map controls (zoom, pan, rotation), custom map gestures, coordinate display, measurement tools, location search, bookmarks, and export capabilities. Build multiple widgets and services for complete geographic functionality.

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive multi-layer mapping system with various overlays and data layers
tasks.description: Create a complete mapping system with multiple layer management, environmental data layers, infrastructure layers, population overlays, and comprehensive controls for the malaria prediction system. Includes base maps, overlays, markers, layer switching, visibility controls, temperature/rainfall/vegetation data, hospitals/health facilities/transportation, population density, demographics, custom configuration, styling, opacity and blending controls.

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive offline caching system for map data and tiles
tasks.description: Setup map tile caching for offline access, implement risk data caching and synchronization, create cache management and storage optimization, build offline mode detection and handling, add cache invalidation and update strategies, implement cache size limits and cleanup, create cache status indicators and controls

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive testing and platform deployment
tasks.description: Create unit tests, widget tests, integration tests, platform-specific configurations, and deployment setup for iOS, Android, Web, and Desktop

tasks.title: Develop comprehensive backend alert system with push notifications
tasks.description: Agent 5: Alert & Notification System Specialist - Implement real-time alert system with WebSocket connections, setup Firebase Cloud Messaging integration, create customizable alert thresholds and preferences, build alert history and management interface, integrate emergency response protocols, implement multi-channel notification delivery (email, SMS, push)

tasks.title: Setup Flutter Testing Framework and Code Quality
tasks.description: Create comprehensive testing framework with unit tests, widget tests, integration tests, performance testing, code quality tools, CI/CD pipeline, and platform testing for Flutter application

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive Flutter testing suite
tasks.description: Set up complete testing infrastructure with unit tests, widget tests, integration tests, and performance tests for malaria prediction Flutter frontend

tasks.title: Test analytics functionality and validate implementation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for widgets, integration tests for BLoC interactions, widget tests for UI components, test data visualization accuracy, validate chart responsiveness, test error handling scenarios, verify performance with large datasets. Create test files: charts_test.dart, dashboard_test.dart, analytics_bloc_test.dart, analytics_integration_test.dart
